ValidationRule.description: Can't push order to "completed" when quantity of order is less then the minimum quantity set on the account.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( ISCHANGED(Status) && CONTAINS($CustomMetadata.OrderSetting__mdt.OrgDefaultOrderSettings.CompletedOrderStatuses__c , TEXT(Status)) && RecordType.DeveloperName = 'TelesalesOrder' && (TotalNumberOfCasesOnOrder__c < Account.MinOrderQuantity__c), true, false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Can't push this order to "Completed". Quantity in order is less than minimum quantity stipulated.
